scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run server"
scripts.start: npm run build && cd server && node server.js
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

comments.comment-start:dev: Script uses concurrently to start client and server apps at same time
comments.comment-concurrently: Concurrently is installed as a dev dependency to allow client and server to be started using single script
